sentences.sContent: He has built a comfortable life in Reykjavik with his family. They vacation abroad.
sentences.sContent_eng: He has built a comfortable life in Reykjavik with his family. They vacation abroad.
sentences.sCn: 他和家人在雷克雅维克过得舒舒服服，还能到国外度假。

sentences.sContent: Iceland, the land of fire and ice, is home to Reykjavik, the world’s northernmost capital.
sentences.sContent_eng: Iceland, the land of fire and ice, is home to Reykjavik, the world’s northernmost capital.
sentences.sCn: 冰岛，火与冰之岛，是世界上最北的首都——雷克雅未克的所在地。

sentences.sContent: People are really ashamed of what we did, but do you make cuts at a cancer ward in Reykjavik to honour those international debts?
sentences.sContent_eng: People are really ashamed of what we did, but do you make cuts at a cancer ward in Reykjavik to honour those international debts?
sentences.sCn: 人们真的为我们的所作所为感到羞耻，但你会为了偿还国际债务削减雷克雅未克某个癌症病房的开支吗？
